item.title: Google’s native multimodal AI image generation in Gemini 2.0 Flash impresses with fast edits, style transfers
item.description: Google Gemini 2.0 Flash enables developers to create illustrations, refine images through conversation, and generate detailed visuals

item.title: ServiceNow expands AI offerings with pre-built agents, targeting broader enterprise adoption
item.description: ServiceNow has upgraded its AI agent offerings as it seeks it sto double down on investing in AI for enterprises.

item.title: Netflix Games loses its vice-president of generative AI
item.description: After embracing generative AI as a core part of its gaming strategy, Netflix's vice president of generative AI has left the company.

item.title: Nous Research just launched an API that gives developers access to AI models that OpenAI and Anthropic won’t build
item.description: Nous Research's new API for "unrestricted" Hermes 3 and DeepHermes-3 AI models features toggle-on reasoning and a developer-first approach.

item.title: Nunu.ai raises $6M for AI agents dubbed ‘unembodied minds’ for game testing
item.description: Nunu.ai has raised $6 million and unveiled Unembodied Minds, or AI agents designed for game testing and to control any given body as needed.
